Cafe Indonesia

Enjoy free, regionally inspired breakfast at participating Hyatt Place hotels as a World of Hyatt member.

More reasons to stay at Inaya Putri Bali

Savor a reimagined breakfast featuring regionally inspired recipes and premium ingredients, including whole fresh fruit, cage-free eggs, all-natural bacon, and more. World of Hyatt members enjoy free breakfast at participating Hyatt Place hotels when booking an eligible rate, Points + Cash, or redeeming a Free Night Award or Room Upgrade Award.

Not a World of Hyatt member? Join now or as you book your stay. It’s free and easy, and you’ll be on your way to enjoying exclusive benefits like this and more:

  • Save up to 10% with Member Rate at participating hotels
  • Enjoy exclusive member-only offers
  • Earn points quickly on stays, dining, spa services and FIND experiences
  • Use points for free nights with no blackout dates at Hyatt hotels, starting at just 5,000 points
